section.title: Mirroring &reponame; repositories with &rmt;
section.para: Use this procedure to mirror the &reponame; repositories for &rhel; &productnumber; and CentOS Linux &productnumber;.

listitem.para: The &rmt; server is installed and up to date.

The &rmt; server has enough storage available for repository mirroring. The amount of storage required depends on the number of repositories you mirror. We recommend at least 1.5 times the total size of all enabled repositories. Be aware that the &reponame; repositories will grow substantially over time.
Your organization credentials appear correctly in /etc/rmt.conf.
You have a &productname; subscription activated in the &scc;.
